amendment.description: Amendment staggers through fiscal year 2010 implementation of the 58 new Federal circuit and district court judgeships created by the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 108-723 to strike sections 1 through 4 and insert several new sections.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sensenbrenner amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Sensenbrenner.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sensenbrenner amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
